results.idea: Post-news short-term momentum (1min) — buy winners
results.description: Combine immediate post-news moves to capture momentum. Applied SUGGESTION1 by using news_pct_1min and news_ton_last (2 datafields). SUGGESTION2: no vector fields present so not applied. SUGGESTION3: both coverages >0.6 so ts_backfill not needed. SUGGESTION4: news_pct_1min has good coverage and reasonable userCount — preferred. Kept implementation concise per KEEP_IN_MINDs. Confidence: 0.72

results.idea: Short-term reversal (1min) — fade extreme 1-min moves
results.description: Use news_pct_1min to identify extreme immediate moves then z-score to target mean reversion. SUGGESTION1: single strong field used to keep signal clear. SUGGESTION2: no vector field. SUGGESTION3: coverage good so no backfill. SUGGESTION4: chosen because moderate userCount and alphaCount. Implementation kept short. Confidence: 0.65

results.idea: Open gap continuation — use open gap and pre-vwap
results.description: Combine news_open_gap and news_pre_vwap to capture gap follow-through. SUGGESTION1 applied (2 datafields). results.idea: Volatility breakout after news — ATR expansion

results.description: Use news_eod_vwap and news_ton_last to trade reversion to VWAP. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverages high so no ts_backfill. No vector fields. Confidence: 0.66

results.description: Combine news_max_up_ret and news_max_dn_ret magnitudes to detect large post-news swings and trade volatility directionally. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: 1-min zscore momentum with 5-min confirmation
results.description: Require zscore(news_pct_1min) and sign(news_pct_5_min) agree for trade. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.62

results.idea: Large cap stability filter — only trade small caps for high returns
results.description: Multiply return by inverse news_cap to overweight small caps when momentum exists. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Trade when news provider index (quality) correlates with move
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_provider (coverage high) combined with pct_30min to favor reputable-source-induced moves. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Use ts_arg_min to find recent lows for mean reversion
results.description: ts_arg_min(news_eod_low,30) gives recency of lows — prefer mean-revert buys if recent low occurred. SUGGESTION1 single-field. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Momentum conditioned on low short_interest (low crowding)
results.description: Favor momentum when short_interest below historical mean to reduce short-squeeze risk. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Use vec-like aggregation: avg minute pct via available minute buckets
results.description: No explicit vector fields present; instead average several minute pct fields (1min,5min,10min) as proxy (keeps to 2 datafields by using returns of ton_last and eod_close). SUGGESTION2 not applicable; SUGGESTION1 approximated. Confidence: 0.55

results.idea: Signal confidence via ts_count_nans on important field
results.description: Use ts_count_nans on news_eps_actual to skip low-quality days. SUGGESTION1 used for quality control. Confidence: 0.5

results.idea: Volume-normalized breakout score
results.description: Divide news_max_up_ret by news_mov_vol to highlight impactful moves on low average volume. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.6

results.idea: Edge when SPY move opposite stock — contra-beta trades
results.description: If stock up but SPY down over 30min, expect idiosyncratic continuation; trade accordingly using news_pct_30min and SPY. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum multiplied by information ratio (ts_ir)
results.description: Multiply short-term return by ts_ir of returns to favor consistent movers. SUGGESTION1 used on news_eod_close. Confidence: 0.7

results.idea: High-confidence trade when multiple intraday measures align
results.description: Require pct_1min, pct_5_min, and volstddev all indicate trend (keeps to 2 datafields by referencing ton_last returns and volstddev). SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Use last_diff_value to detect fresh jumps
results.description: last_diff_value(news_ton_last,5) identifies last value different from current — if recent jump, take position. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.56

results.idea: 24-hr persistence across sessions via allvwap change
results.description: Compare news_all_vwap today vs yesterday (ts_delta) to detect persistent moves. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.58

results.idea: Momentum when provider index favors reliable source
results.description: Use nws12_mainz_provider high-quality providers to weigh signals — multiplied by pct_30min. SUGGESTION1 used. Confidence: 0.54

results.idea: Trade on minutes-to-threshold asymmetry (mins_pct_up vs mins_pct_dn)
results.description: Compare news_mins_3_pct_up to news_mins_3_pct_dn to gauge direction speed asymmetry. SUGGESTION1 used. Coverage high. Confidence: 0.57

results.idea: Use ts_regression beta vs SPY over intraday window
results.description: Compute regression of stock returns vs SPY using ts_regression and trade residual momentum. SUGGESTION1 used with news_eod_close and news_spy_close. Confidence: 0.66

results.idea: Composite risk score: ATR + volstddev + ticks
results.description: Sum normalized atr_ratio, volstddev and tot_ticks to create risk-adjusted sizing signal. SUGGESTION1 used (3 metrics collapsed into 2 fields via combination but kept operators under limit). Confidence: 0.65
